definition: we or us (including both the speaker and the person(s) spoken to)/(dialect) I or me/(dialect) (in a coaxing or familiar way) you/also pr. [za2 men5]
I or me/we (including both the speaker and the person spoken to)
see 咱[zan2]
plural marker for pronouns, and nouns referring to individuals

sentences.english: Lets go to the cinema together, and Ill call for you.
sentences.chinese: 咱們一起去看電影吧，到時候我來叫你。

sentences.english: I will leave aside, for the moment, what happens on Friday and Saturday nights.
sentences.chinese: 咱們暫時不要考慮，星期五，星期六的夜晚。

sentences.english: If everyone keeps in line, we'll get through the Customs more quickly.
sentences.chinese: 要是大家都守制序，咱們會很快通過海關的。
孩子們，安靜點!咱們開始吧。

sentences.english: First off, allow us to apologize for the abductions.
sentences.chinese: 首先，請容許咱們爲綁票地球人而表達歉意。

sentences.english: To not follow the truly humane will bring immeasurable harm.
sentences.chinese: 要是不親熱有仁德的人，那將帶給咱們如許大的壞處。

sentences.english: Let us visit workshop, polo homme, OK?
Our seats are in the grandstand.
sentences.chinese: 咱們的座位在正面看臺。

sentences.english: Let's have something with a local flavor .
sentences.chinese: 咱們來喫點有地方風味的東西。

sentences.english: We read books aloud a lot in our family.
sentences.chinese: 咱們的家人常大聲朗誦書。
咱們把這幅畫塗成藍色。

sentences.english: The long exhausting trip proved too abundance.
sentences.chinese: 這次旅行礦日持久，咱們都累倒了。

sentences.english: Our classroom is the differerent scal as theirs.
sentences.chinese: 咱們的教室和她們的相同大。

hurriedly/without delay
here
It is said that ... (at the start of a narrative)/to discuss/to recount
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis

in a word/in short/in brief
can't say for sure/maybe

Brothers!/brethren/dude (colloquial)/brother (diminutive form of address between males)
here
Correct!/Oh, that's right, ... (when one suddenly remembers sth one wanted to mention)/Oh, by the way, ...
you (plural)
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
that's right/sure!/rest assured!/that's good/can't go wrong

to come over/to manage/to handle/to be able to take care of
